量子多体理论第四章(1)

发表于 2023-07-02 阅读次数： Waline：
✨（施工中）一个可能很有用的多体理论笔记。

有限温单粒子格林函数, 费曼图技术及其应用

目前为止我们讲到的三种格林函数都是零温情况的, 它们分别是因果格林函数, 推迟格林函数和超前格林函数. 其中, 因果格林函数可以利用 Wick 定理展开.

现在要讨论的是有限温度下的系统. 可以引入有限温度下的因果、推迟和超前热力学格林函数, 但不能直接由零温格林函数通过代换基态平均得到. 此时必须考虑另外一种格林函数. 日本京都大学的松原教授提出一个非常巧妙的方案, 人们称为松原格林函数, 也称为虚时格林函数. 在有限温度中, 只有这种格林函数可以利用费曼图技术, 其他格林函数可以利用相互之间的关系式求出来. 下面介绍松原格林函数.

单粒子松原(Matsubara)格林函数

考虑有限温度时, 采用巨正则系综比较方便.

巨正则系综下, 哈密顿量改写为: , 其中 是系统的化学势, 是总粒子数算符.

有限温情况下, 需要引入密度算符处理混合态:

其中 , 是巨正则系综的配分函数, 表达式为

巨正则系综下, 有类似于正则系综中自由能的热力学势

配分函数可以用热力学势表示为

相应的可以把密度算符表示成

巨正则系综中, 算符的平均值可以用密度算符表示为

通常通过粒子数算符的平均值来确定化学势 , 有

设 不显含时间, 巨正则系综的场算符在诸绘景下可以表示为:

  • 薛定谔绘景:
  • 海森伯绘景:
    $$
    \hat{\psi}{H\alpha}^{ }(\boldsymbol{x},\tau) \equiv \mathrm{e}^{\hat{K}\tau}\hat{\psi}\alpha(\boldsymbol{x})\mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K}\tau},\quad \hat{\psi}^ \dagger{H\alpha}(\boldsymbol{x},\tau) \equiv \mathrm{e}^{\hat{K}\tau}\hat{\psi}\alpha^ \dagger (\boldsymbol{x})\mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K}\tau}.

    \hat{\psi}    {H\alpha}^ \dagger (\boldsymbol{x},\tau)\ne \left[ \hat{\psi}^{}    {H\alpha}(\boldsymbol{x},\tau) \right]^ \dagger.
    $$

有限温格林函数将采用海森伯绘景下的虚时场算符. 下面给出单粒子松原格林函数的定义.

单粒子松原格林函数

$$
\begin{aligned}
\mathcal{G}{\alpha\beta}(\boldsymbol{x},\tau; \boldsymbol{x}’,\tau’) \equiv& - \mathrm{Tr} \left[ \hat{\rho}\hat{T}^{}\tau \left[\hat{\psi}^{ }{H\alpha}(\boldsymbol{x},\tau)\hat{\psi}^ \dagger{H\beta}(\boldsymbol{x}’,\tau’)\right] \right]\
=&-\left\langle \hat{T}^{}\tau \left[ \hat{\psi}{H\alpha}^{ }(\boldsymbol{x},\tau)\hat{\psi}_{H\beta}^ \dagger (\boldsymbol{x}’,\tau’) \right] \right\rangle_T.
\end{aligned}
$$

诸物理量的表示

单体算符的平均值

单体算符的一般表达式为
$$
F_2^{(1)}=\sum_\alpha\sum_\beta\int\hat{\psi}\alpha^ \dagger (\boldsymbol{x})\hat{f}{\alpha\beta}(\boldsymbol{x})\hat{\psi}\beta^{ }(\boldsymbol{x})\mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x},

\begin{aligned}
\left\langle \hat{F}2^{(1)} \right\rangle_T=&\sum_\alpha\sum_\beta\int\mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x} \mathrm{Tr} \left[ \hat{\rho}\hat{\psi}\alpha^ \dagger (\boldsymbol{x})\hat{f}{\alpha\beta}(\boldsymbol{x})\hat{\psi}\beta^{ }(\boldsymbol{x}) \right]\nonumber\
=&\sum_\alpha\sum_\beta\int\mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x}\lim{\boldsymbol{x}’\to \boldsymbol{x}}\hat{f}^{}{\alpha\beta}(\boldsymbol{x}) \mathrm{Tr} \left[ \hat{\rho}\hat{\psi}\alpha^ \dagger(\boldsymbol{x}’)\hat{\psi}\beta^{ }(\boldsymbol{x}) \right]\nonumber\
=&\sum_\alpha\sum_\beta\int\mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x}\lim{\boldsymbol{x}’\to \boldsymbol{x}}\hat{f}^{}{\alpha\beta}(\boldsymbol{x}) \mathrm{Tr} \left[ \hat{\rho}\mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K}\tau}\hat{\psi}{H\alpha}^ \dagger (\boldsymbol{x}’,\tau)\mathrm{e}^{\hat{K}\tau} \mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K}\tau}\hat{\psi}{H\beta}^{ }(\boldsymbol{x},\tau)\mathrm{e}^{\hat{K}\tau} \right]\nonumber\
=&\sum_\alpha\sum_\beta\int\mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x}\lim{\boldsymbol{x}’\to \boldsymbol{x}\atop \tau’\to \tau^+}\hat{f}^{}{\alpha\beta}(\boldsymbol{x}) \mathrm{Tr} \left[ \hat{\rho}\hat{\psi}{H\alpha}^ \dagger (\boldsymbol{x}’,\tau’)\hat{\psi}{H\beta}^{ }(\boldsymbol{x},\tau) \right]\nonumber\
=&\sum_\alpha\sum_\beta\int\mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x}\lim{\boldsymbol{x}’\to \boldsymbol{x}\atop \tau’\to \tau^+}\hat{f}^{}{\alpha\beta}(\boldsymbol{x}) \mathrm{Tr} \left[ \hat{\rho}\hat{T}{\tau}\left[\hat{\psi}{H\alpha}^ \dagger (\boldsymbol{x}’,\tau’)\hat{\psi}{H\beta}^{ }(\boldsymbol{x},\tau)\right] \right]\nonumber\
=&\pm\sum_\alpha\sum_\beta\int\mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x}\lim_{\boldsymbol{x}’\to \boldsymbol{x}\atop \tau’\to \tau^+}\hat{f}^{}{\alpha\beta}(\boldsymbol{x}) \mathrm{Tr} \left[ \hat{\rho}\hat{T}{\tau}\left[\hat{\psi}{H\beta}^{ }(\boldsymbol{x},\tau)\hat{\psi}{H\alpha}^ \dagger (\boldsymbol{x}’,\tau’)\right] \right]\nonumber\
=&\mp\sum_\alpha\sum_\beta\int\mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x}\lim_{\boldsymbol{x}’\to \boldsymbol{x}\atop \tau’\to \tau^+}\hat{f}^{}{\alpha\beta}(\boldsymbol{x}) \mathcal{G}{\beta\alpha}(\boldsymbol{x},\tau; \boldsymbol{x}’,\tau’).
\end{aligned}
$$
若 $\hat{f}{\alpha\beta}$
\hat{f}{\alpha\beta}=\hat{f}\delta_{\alpha\beta},

\left\langle \hat{F}2^{(1)} \right\rangle_T=\mp\sum_\alpha\int\mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x}\lim{\boldsymbol{x}’\to \boldsymbol{x}\atop \tau’\to \tau^+}\hat{f}(\boldsymbol{x}) \mathcal{G}{\alpha\alpha}(\boldsymbol{x},\tau; \boldsymbol{x}’,\tau’).
$$
例: 总动量算符
$$
\langle\hat{T}\rangle_T=\mp\sum_\alpha\int\mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x}\lim{\boldsymbol{x}’\to \boldsymbol{x}\atop \tau’\to \tau^+}\left(-\frac{\nabla_x^2}{2m}\right) \mathcal{G}{\alpha\alpha}(\boldsymbol{x},\tau; \boldsymbol{x}’,\tau’).
$$
例: 总粒子数算符
$$
\langle\hat{N}\rangle_T=\mp\sum_\alpha\int\mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x}\lim{\boldsymbol{x}’\to \boldsymbol{x}\atop \tau’\to \tau^+} \mathcal{G}{\alpha\alpha}(\boldsymbol{x},\tau; \boldsymbol{x}’,\tau’).
$$
例: 总自旋算符
$$
\langle \hat{S} \rangle_T=\mp\sum_\alpha\sum_\beta\int\mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x}\lim{\tau’\to \tau^+}S_{\alpha\beta}\mathcal{G}_{\beta\alpha}(\boldsymbol{x},\tau; \boldsymbol{x},\tau’).
$$

两体相互作用

两体相互作用可以写作
$$
\hat{V}=\frac{1}{2}\sum_{\alpha}\sum_\beta\iint\mathrm{d}\boldsymbol x \mathrm{d} \boldsymbol x’ \hat{\psi}{\alpha}^{ \dagger}(\boldsymbol x) \hat{\psi}{\beta}^{ \dagger}(\boldsymbol x’)\hat{V}(\boldsymbol x-\boldsymbol x’)\hat{\psi}{\beta}^{}(\boldsymbol x’)\hat{\psi}{\alpha}^{}(\boldsymbol x),

\langle\hat{V}\rangle_T=\mp \frac{1}{2} \sum_\alpha \int \mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x} \lim {\substack{\boldsymbol{x}’ \rightarrow \boldsymbol{x} \ \tau’ \rightarrow \tau^{+}}}\left[-\frac{\partial}{\partial \tau}+\frac{\nabla{\boldsymbol x}^2}{2 m}+\mu\right] \mathcal{G}_{\alpha \alpha}\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau ; \boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right) .
$$

内能

内能可以表示为体系哈密顿量的热力学平均, 即
$$
\begin{aligned}
E=&\langle\hat{H}\rangle_T=\langle\hat{T}\rangle_T+\langle\hat{V}\rangle_T\
=&\mp \frac{1}{2} \sum_\alpha \int \mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x} \lim {\substack{\boldsymbol{x}’ \rightarrow \boldsymbol{x} \ \tau’ \rightarrow \tau^{+}}}\left[-\frac{\partial}{\partial \tau}-\frac{\nabla{\boldsymbol x}^2}{2 m}+\mu\right] \mathcal{G}_{\alpha \alpha}\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau ; \boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right) .
\end{aligned}
$$

热力学势 的计算公式

巨正则系综下, 热力学势 是一个很重要的物理量. 如果可以计算出体系的热力学势, 就可以得到体系的很多信息. 仿照上一章计算零温基态能的第二种方式, 引入如下赝哈密顿量:

其中 . 表示自由粒子体系的哈密顿量, 通常是总动能 . 表示粒子间的相互作用, 通常考虑两体相互作用 . 时, 表示不考虑相互作用的自由粒子体系的哈密顿量; 时, 是相互作用体系真实的哈密顿量; 区间内的 对应的哈密顿量 , 只是为了方便数学计算, 并不对应实际的哈密顿量. 对于巨正则系综, 还可以引入:

其中
$$
\hat{K}_0 \equiv \hat{H}_0-\mu \hat{N}, \quad \hat{K}1 \equiv \hat{H}1.

\Xi(\lambda)=\operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{-\beta \hat{K}(\lambda)}\right],

\Omega(\lambda)=-\frac{1}{\beta} \ln \Xi(\lambda) .

\frac{\partial \Omega(\lambda)}{\partial \lambda}=-\frac{1}{\beta} \frac{1}{\Xi(\lambda)} \frac{\partial \Xi(\lambda)}{\partial \lambda},

\begin{aligned}
\frac{\partial \Xi(\lambda)}{\partial \lambda} =&\frac{\partial}{\partial \lambda} \operatorname{Tr}\left[\sum{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{[-\beta \hat{K}(\lambda)]^n}{n !}\right] \
=&\sum{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{(-\beta)^n}{n !} \operatorname{Tr}\left[\frac{\partial}{\partial \lambda}\left(\hat{K}_0+\lambda \hat{K}1\right)^n\right] \
=&\sum{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{(-\beta)^n}{n !} \operatorname{Tr}\left[n\left(\hat{K}_0+\lambda \hat{K}_1\right)^{(n-1)}\hat{K}1\right]\
=&(-\beta) \sum{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{(-\beta)^{(n-1)}}{(n-1) !} \operatorname{Tr}\left[\left(\hat{K}_0+\lambda \hat{K}_1\right)^{(n-1)} \hat{K}1\right] \
\stackrel{m=n-1}{\longrightarrow} &(-\beta) \sum{m=0}^{\infty} \frac{(-\beta)^m}{m !} \operatorname{Tr}\left[\left(\hat{K}_0+\lambda \hat{K}_1\right)^m \hat{K}_1\right] \
=&(-\beta) \operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{-\beta \hat{K}(\lambda)} \hat{K}_1\right] \
=&-\frac{\beta}{\lambda} \mathrm{e}^{-\beta \Omega(\lambda)} \operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\beta(\Omega(\lambda)-\hat{K}(\lambda))} \lambda \hat{K}_1\right] \
=&-\frac{\beta}{\lambda} \mathrm{e}^{-\beta \Omega(\lambda)}\left\langle\lambda \hat{K}_1\right\rangle_\lambda,
\end{aligned}

\frac{\partial \Omega(\lambda)}{\partial \lambda}=-\frac{1}{\beta}\left[-\frac{\beta}{\lambda} \mathrm{e}^{-\beta \Omega(\lambda)}\left\langle\lambda \hat{K}_1\right\rangle_\lambda\right]=\frac{\left\langle\lambda \hat{K}_1\right\rangle_\lambda}{\lambda},

\left.\Omega(\lambda)\right|_0 ^1=\int_0^1 \mathrm{d} \lambda \frac{\left\langle\lambda \hat{K}_1\right\rangle_\lambda}{\lambda}

\Omega=\Omega_0+\int_0^1 \mathrm{d} \lambda \frac{\left\langle\lambda \hat{K}_1\right\rangle_\lambda}{\lambda},
$$
其中 是自由粒子体系的热力学势. 考虑两体相互作用, 即 $\hat{K}_1=\hat{H}1=\hat{V}\hat{V}\lambda \hat{K}1\lambda \hat{K}1\hat{V}\lambda$
\Omega=\Omega_0 \mp \frac{1}{2}\sum_\alpha\int_0^1 \frac{\mathrm{d} \lambda}{\lambda} \int \mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x} \lim {\substack{\boldsymbol{x}’ \rightarrow \boldsymbol{x} \ \tau’ \rightarrow \tau^{+}}}\left[-\frac{\partial}{\partial \tau}+\frac{\nabla{\boldsymbol x}^2}{2 m}+\mu\right] \mathcal{G}\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau ; \boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’ ; \lambda\right) .

\begin{aligned}
\langle \hat N \rangle_T &= -\left(\frac{\partial \Omega}{\partial \mu}\right){T,V};\
P &= -\left(\frac{\partial \Omega}{\partial V}\right){\mu ,T};\
S &= -\left(\frac{\partial \Omega}{\partial T}\right){\mu ,V}.
\end{aligned}
$$

单粒子松原格林函数的若干性质及傅立叶变换

单粒子松原格林函数的对称性

与零温单粒子格林函数相同, 当体系(或哈密顿量)具有某种对称性, 相应的单粒子松原格林函数可以进行简化:

  • 若 不显含时间, 则
    $$
    \mathcal{G}{\alpha \beta}\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau ; \boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)=\mathcal{G}{\alpha \beta}\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \boldsymbol{x}’ ; \tau-\tau’\right);
    $$
  • 若体系是空间均匀的, 即 $[\hat{H}, \hat{\boldsymbol{P}}]{-}=0\hat{\boldsymbol{P}}$
    \mathcal{G}    {\alpha \beta}\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau ; \boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)=\mathcal{G}_{\alpha \beta}\left(\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}’ ; \tau, \tau’\right);
    $$
  • 若相互作用与自旋无关, 则
    $$
    \mathcal{G}{\alpha \beta}\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau ; \boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)=\delta{\alpha \beta} \mathcal{G}\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau ; \boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right),

    \mathcal{G}\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau ; \boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)=\frac{\sum\limits_{\alpha \alpha} \mathcal{G}_{ \alpha}\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau ; \boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)}{2 S+1}.
    $$

单粒子松原格林函数的周期性与反周期性

考虑体系的哈密顿量不显含时间, 即
$$
\mathcal{G}{\alpha \beta}\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau ; \boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)=\mathcal{G}{\alpha \beta}\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \boldsymbol{x}’ ; \tau-\tau’\right) \equiv\mathcal{G}{\alpha \beta}\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \boldsymbol{x}’ ; \tilde{\tau}\right).

\mathcal{G}{\alpha \beta}\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \boldsymbol{x}’ ; \tilde{\tau}< 0\right)=\pm \mathcal{G}_{\alpha \beta}\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \boldsymbol{x}’ ; \tilde{\tau}+\beta>0\right),
$$
其中 对应玻色子, 对应费米子. 将该关系表示在数轴上, 如图1所示.

图1

下面来证明这一关系. 由单粒子松原格林函数的定义式:
$$
\mathcal{G}{\alpha \beta}\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \boldsymbol{x}’ ; \tilde{\tau}\right)=-\operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\beta(\Omega-\hat{K})} \hat{T}\tau\left[\hat{\psi}^{}{H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tilde{\tau}) \hat{\psi}{H\beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’\right)\right]\right],
$$
可以看出由于虚时编时乘积的作用, 和 时的单粒子松原格林函数的表达式不同, 由此引入了周期性或反周期性. 下面分别讨论这两种情况下单粒子松原格林函数的表达式.

(i) , 即 :
$$
\mathcal{G}^{(1)}{\alpha \beta}\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \boldsymbol{x}’ ; \tilde{\tau}\right) =-\operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\beta(\Omega-\hat{K})} \hat{\psi}^{}{H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tilde{\tau}) \hat{\psi}{H\beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’\right)\right] ;

\begin{aligned}
\mathcal{G}^{(2)}{\alpha \beta}\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \boldsymbol{x}’ ; \tilde{\tau}\right) & =\mp \operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\beta(\Omega-\hat{K})} \hat{\psi}{H\beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’\right) \hat{\psi}^{}{H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tilde{\tau})\right] \
& =\mp \operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\beta(\Omega-\hat{K})} \hat{\psi}{H\beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’\right) \mathrm{e}^{\hat{K} \tilde{\tau}} \hat{\psi}^{}\alpha(\boldsymbol{x}) \mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K} \tilde{\tau}}\right] \
& =\mp \operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\hat{K} \tilde{\tau}} \hat{\psi}^{}\alpha(\boldsymbol{x}) \mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K} \tilde{\tau}} \mathrm{e}^{\beta(\Omega-\hat{K})} \hat{\psi}{H\beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’\right)\right] \
& =\mp \operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\beta \Omega} \mathrm{e}^{\hat{K} \tilde{\tau}} \hat{\psi}^{}\alpha(\boldsymbol{x}) \mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K}(\tilde{\tau}+\beta)} \hat{\psi}{H\beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’\right)\right] \
& =\mp \operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\beta(\Omega-\hat{K})} \mathrm{e}^{\hat{K}(\tilde{\tau}+\beta)} \hat{\psi}^{}\alpha(\boldsymbol{x}) \mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K}(\tilde{\tau}+\beta)} \hat{\psi}{H\beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’\right)\right] \
& =\mp \operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\beta(\Omega-\hat{K})} \hat{\psi}^{}{H\alpha}(\boldsymbol{x},\beta+ \tilde{\tau}) \hat{\psi}{H\beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’\right)\right] \
& =\pm \mathcal{G}^{(1)}_{\alpha \beta}\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \boldsymbol{x}’ ; \tilde{\tau}+\beta\right) .
\end{aligned}
$$
这样就证明了单粒子松原格林函数的周期性(反周期性).

单粒子松原格林函数对“虚时”的傅里叶变换

与零温格林函数的傅里叶变换不同, 有限温格林函数中的 “虚时” 是在 区间内变换, 而且具有周期性或反周期性. 零温格林函数中的时间是从 区间内变换, 所以可以引入平面波表象进行连续的傅里叶变换. 而有限温格林函数需要进行分立的傅里叶变换, 引入如下在 区间内完备的波函数(三角函数基):

这一组完备波函数满足如下正交关系和完备关系:
$$
\left{\begin{aligned}
\int_{-\beta}^\beta \psi_{n’}^*(\tau) \psi^{}n(\tau) \mathrm{d} \tau & =\delta{n n’}, \
\sum_n \psi_n^*\left(\tau’\right) \psi^{}n(\tau) & =\delta\left(\tau-\tau’\right) .
\end{aligned}\right.

\mathcal{G}(\tau)=\frac{1}{\beta} \sum_n \mathcal{G}\left(\mathrm{i} \omega_n\right) \mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \omega_n \tau},

\mathcal{G}\left(\mathrm{i} \omega_n\right)=\frac{1}{2} \int{-\beta}^\beta \mathcal{G}(\tau) \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \omega_n \tau}\mathrm{d} \tau .

\mathcal{G}\left(\mathrm{i} \omega_n\right)=\frac{1}{2} \int_{-\beta}^0 \mathcal{G}^{(2)}(\tau) \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \omega_n \tau} \mathrm{d} \tau+\frac{1}{2} \int_0^\beta \mathcal{G}^{(1)}(\tau) \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \omega_n \tau} \mathrm{d} \tau,




$$
对于玻色子和费米子, 分别有:

  • 玻色子: 为偶数时, 可能不为零;
  • 费米子: 为奇数时, 可能不为零.

故最终可以得到:

由于 在 区间内就是 , 所以上式还可以更一般地写为:

其中
$$
\omega_n=\left{\quad n=0, \pm 1, \pm 2, \cdots .\right.
$$

自由粒子的单粒子松原格林函数

自由粒子系统的单粒子零温格林函数在微扰计算中十分重要, 同样, 自由粒子系统的单粒子松原格林函数在微扰计算中也是十分重要, 下面计算其具体的形式.

自由粒子体系的哈密顿量可以在平面波表象下写成如下二次量子化的形式:
$$
\hat{H}=\hat{H}0=\sum{k \sigma} \epsilon_k^0 \hat{C}{k \sigma}^{\dagger} \hat{C}^{}{k \sigma}.

\hat{K}=\hat{K}0=\hat{H}0-\mu \hat{N}=\sum{k \sigma}\left(\epsilon_k^0-\mu\right) \hat{C}{k \sigma}^{\dagger} \hat{C}^{}{k \sigma},

\left{\begin{aligned}
\hat{\psi}\alpha(\boldsymbol{x})&=\frac{1}{\sqrt{V}} \sum_k \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}} \hat{C}{k \alpha}, \
\hat{\psi}\beta^{\dagger}(\boldsymbol{x})&=\frac{1}{\sqrt{V}} \sum_k \mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}} \hat{C}{k \beta}^{\dagger},
\end{aligned}\right.

\left{\begin{aligned}
\hat{\psi}{H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau)&=\mathrm{e}^{\hat{K}0 \tau} \hat{\psi}\alpha(\boldsymbol{x}) \mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K}0 \tau}, \
\hat{\psi}{H \beta}^{\dagger}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau)&=\mathrm{e}^{\hat{K}0 \tau} \hat{\psi}\beta^{\dagger}(\boldsymbol{x}) \mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K}0 \tau},
\end{aligned}\right.
$$
把 $\hat{\psi}\alpha(\boldsymbol{x})\hat{\psi}\alpha^{\dagger}(\boldsymbol{x})$
\begin{aligned}
\hat{\psi}{H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau)&=\frac{1}{\sqrt{V}} \sum_k \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}} \mathrm{e}^{\hat{K}0 \tau} \hat{C}{k \alpha} \mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K}0 \tau}\
&=\frac{1}{\sqrt{V}} \sum_k \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}} \hat{C}{k \alpha} \mathrm{e}^{-\left(\epsilon_k^0-\mu\right) \tau} \
&=\frac{1}{\sqrt{V}} \sum_k \hat{C}{k \alpha} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}-\left(\epsilon_k^0-\mu\right) \tau};\
\hat{\psi}{H \beta}^{\dagger}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau)&=\frac{1}{\sqrt{V}} \sum_k \mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}} \mathrm{e}^{\hat{K}0 \tau} \hat{C}{k \beta}^{\dagger} \mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K}0 \tau}\
&=\frac{1}{\sqrt{V}} \sum_k \mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}} \hat{C}{k \beta}^{\dagger} \mathrm{e}^{\left(\epsilon_k^0-\mu\right) \tau}\
&=\frac{1}{\sqrt{V}} \sum_k \hat{C}{k \beta}^{\dagger} \mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}+\left(\epsilon_k^0-\mu\right) \tau} .
\end{aligned}

\begin{aligned}
\mathcal{G}{\alpha \beta}^0\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau ; \boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)= & -\operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\beta\left(\Omega_0-\hat{K}0\right)} \hat{T}\tau\left[\hat{\psi}^{}{H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau) \hat{\psi}{H \beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)\right]\right] \
= & -\theta\left(\tau-\tau’\right) \operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\beta\left(\Omega_0-\hat{K}0\right)} \hat{\psi}^{}{H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau) \hat{\psi}{H \beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)\right] \
& \mp \theta\left(\tau’-\tau\right) \operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\beta\left(\Omega_0-\hat{K}0\right)} \hat{\psi}{H \beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right) \hat{\psi}^{}{H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau)\right] .
\end{aligned}

\begin{aligned}
& -\theta\left(\tau-\tau’\right) \operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\beta\left(\Omega_0-\hat{K}0\right)} \hat{\psi}^{}{H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau) \hat{\psi}{H \beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)\right] \
= & -\theta\left(\tau-\tau’\right) \frac{1}{V} \sum_k \sum{k’} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}} \mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k}’ \cdot \boldsymbol{x}’} \mathrm{e}^{-\left(\epsilon_k^0-\mu\right) \tau} \mathrm{e}^{\left(\epsilon_{k’}^0-\mu\right) \tau’} \operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\beta\left(\Omega_0-\hat{K}0\right)} \hat{C}^{}{k \alpha} \hat{C}{k’ \beta}^{\dagger}\right],
\end{aligned}

\mathrm{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\beta\left(\Omega_0-\hat{K}0\right)} \hat{C}^{}{k \alpha} \hat{C}{k’\beta}^{\dagger}\right]=\left\langle\hat{C}^{}{k \alpha} \hat{C}{k’\beta}^{\dagger}\right\rangle_T=\delta_{\alpha \beta} \delta_{k k’}\left\langle 1 \pm \hat{n}k\right\rangle_0=\delta{\alpha \beta} \delta_{k k’}\left(1 \pm n_k^0\right),

n_k^0=\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}^{\beta\left(\epsilon_k^0-\mu\right)} \mp 1} .

-\theta\left(\tau-\tau’\right) \frac{1}{V} \sum_k \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k} \cdot\left(\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}’\right)} \mathrm{e}^{-\left(\epsilon_k^0-\mu\right)\left(\tau-\tau’\right)} \delta_{\alpha \beta}\left(1 \pm n_k^0\right).

\mp \theta\left(\tau’-\tau\right) \frac{1}{V} \sum_k \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k} \cdot\left(\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}’\right)} \mathrm{e}^{-\left(\epsilon_k^0-\mu\right)\left(\tau-\tau’\right)} \delta_{\alpha \beta} n_k^0.

\begin{aligned}
\mathcal{G}{\alpha \beta}^0\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau ; \boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)=& -\theta\left(\tau-\tau’\right) \frac{1}{V} \sum_k \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k} \cdot\left(\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}’\right)} \mathrm{e}^{-\left(\epsilon_k^0-\mu\right)\left(\tau-\tau’\right)} \delta{\alpha \beta}\left(1 \pm n_k^0\right) \
& \mp \theta\left(\tau’-\tau\right) \frac{1}{V} \sum_k \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k} \cdot\left(\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}’\right)} \mathrm{e}^{-\left(\epsilon_k^0-\mu\right)\left(\tau-\tau’\right)} \delta_{\alpha \beta} n_k^0 .
\end{aligned}

\begin{aligned}
\langle\hat{N}\rangle_T & =\mp \sum_\alpha \int \mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x} \lim {\substack{\boldsymbol{x}’ \rightarrow \boldsymbol{x} \
\tau’ \rightarrow \tau^{+}}} \mathcal{G}{\alpha \alpha}^0\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau ; \boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right) \
& =\mp \sum_\alpha \int \mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x} \lim {\substack{\boldsymbol{x}’ \rightarrow \boldsymbol{x} \
\tau’ \rightarrow \tau^{+}}}\left[\mp \frac{1}{V} \sum_k \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k} \cdot\left(\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}’\right)} \mathrm{e}^{-\left(\epsilon_k^0-\mu\right)\left(\tau-\tau’\right)} \delta{\alpha \alpha } n_k^0\right] \
& =\sum_{ \alpha}\sum_{k} \frac{1}{V} \int \mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x} n_k^0 \
& =\sum_{ \alpha}\sum_{k} n_k^0 .
\end{aligned}

\begin{aligned}
\langle E\rangle_T=&\langle\hat{H}\rangle_T=\langle\hat{H}0\rangle_T\
=&\mp \frac{1}{2} \sum_\alpha \int \mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x} \lim {\substack{\boldsymbol{x}’ \rightarrow \boldsymbol{x} \ \tau’ \rightarrow \tau^{+}}}\left[-\frac{\partial}{\partial \tau}-\frac{\nabla{\boldsymbol x}^2}{2 m}+\mu\right] \mathcal{G}^0{\alpha \alpha}\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau ; \boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)\
=&\mp \frac{1}{2} \sum_\alpha \int \mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x} \lim {\substack{\boldsymbol{x}’ \rightarrow \boldsymbol{x} \ \tau’ \rightarrow \tau^{+}}}\left[-\frac{\partial}{\partial \tau}-\frac{\nabla{\boldsymbol x}^2}{2 m}+\mu\right]\left[\mp \frac{1}{V} \sum_k \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k} \cdot\left(\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}’\right)} \mathrm{e}^{-\left(\epsilon_k^0-\mu\right)\left(\tau-\tau’\right)} n_k^0\right] \
=& \frac{1}{2}\frac{1}{V}\sum_\alpha\int \mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x}\left[\left(\epsilon_k^0-\mu\right)-\frac{(\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k})^2}{2 m}+\mu\right]n_k^0\
=& \frac{1}{2}\frac{1}{V}\sum_\alpha\int \mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x}\left[\left(\epsilon_k^0-\mu\right)+\epsilon_k^0+\mu\right]n_k^0\
=&\sum_\alpha\epsilon_k^0 n_k^0 .
\end{aligned}

\mathcal{G}{\alpha \beta}^0\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau ; \boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)=\frac{1}{V} \sum_k \frac{1}{\beta} \sum_n\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k} \cdot\left(\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}’\right)} \mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \omega_n\left(\tau-\tau’\right)} \mathcal{G}{\alpha \beta}^0(\boldsymbol{k}, \mathrm{i} \omega_n),

\mathcal{G}{\alpha \beta}^0(\boldsymbol{k}, \mathrm{i} \omega_n)=\int \mathrm{d}\left(\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}’\right)\int_0^\beta \mathrm{d}\left(\tau-\tau’\right) \mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k} \cdot\left(\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}’\right)} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \omega_n\left(\tau-\tau’\right)} \mathcal{G}{\alpha \beta}^0\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau ; \boldsymbol{x}’. \tau’\right)

\begin{aligned}
\mathcal{G}{\alpha \beta}^0(\boldsymbol{k}, \mathrm{i} \omega) =&-\frac{\delta{\alpha \beta}}{V} \int \mathrm{d}\left(\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}’\right) \mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k} \cdot\left(\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}’\right)} \int_0^\beta \mathrm{d}\left(\tau-\tau’\right) \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \omega_n\left(\tau-\tau’\right)} \
&\sum_{k’} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k}’ \cdot\left(\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}’\right)} \mathrm{e}^{-\left(\epsilon_{k’}^0-\mu\right)\left(\tau-\tau’\right)}\left(1 \pm n_{k’}^0\right) \
=&-\delta_{\alpha \beta} \int_0^\beta \mathrm{d}\left(\tau-\tau’\right)\mathrm{e}^{\left[\mathrm{i} \omega_n-\left(\epsilon_k^0-\mu\right)\right]\left(\tau-\tau’\right)}\left(1 \pm n_k^0\right) \
=&-\left.\frac{\delta_{\alpha \beta}}{\mathrm{i} \omega_n-\left(\epsilon_k^0-\mu\right)} \mathrm{e}^{\left[\mathrm{i} \omega_n-\left(\epsilon_k^0-\mu\right)\right]\left(\tau-\tau’\right)}\right|{\tau-\tau’=0} ^\beta\left(1 \pm n_k^0\right) \
=&-\frac{\delta{\alpha \beta}}{\mathrm{i} \omega_n-\left(\epsilon_k^0-\mu\right)}\left{\mathrm{e}^{\left[\mathrm{i} \omega_n-\left(\epsilon_k^0-\mu\right)\right] \beta}-1\right}\left(1 \pm n_k^0\right) .
\end{aligned}
$$
分两种情况讨论:

  • 玻色子. 此时 , 有:
  • 费米子. 此时 , 有:

两种情况结果相同, 可以得到一个统一的表达式:
$$
\mathcal{G}{\alpha \beta}^0(\boldsymbol{k}, \mathrm{i} \omega)=\frac{\delta{\alpha \beta}}{\mathrm{i} \omega_n-\left(\epsilon_k^0-\mu\right)},
$$
这是之后费曼图展开后的基本单元.

单粒子松原格林函数的 Lehmann 表示

为了进一步考虑单粒子松原格林函数的解析性质, 我们引入单粒子松原格林函数的 Lehmann 表示. 和零温情况一样, 单粒子松原格林函数的 Lehmann 表示也是考虑均匀的系统, 即$[\hat{H}, \hat{\boldsymbol{P}}]{-}=0{\hat{H}, \hat{N}, \hat{\boldsymbol{P}}}{|n\rangle}=\left{\left|E_n, N_n, \boldsymbol{P}n\right\rangle\right}$
\hat{H}|n\rangle=E_n|n\rangle, \quad \hat{N}|n\rangle=N_n|n\rangle, \quad \hat{\boldsymbol{P}}|n\rangle=\boldsymbol{P}n|n\rangle.

\hat{K}|n\rangle=(\hat{H}-\mu \hat{N})|n\rangle=\left(E_n-\mu N_n\right)|n\rangle=K_n|n\rangle .

\begin{aligned}
\mathcal{G}{\alpha \beta}\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau ; \boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)= & -\left\langle\hat{T}\tau\left[\hat{\psi}^{}{H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau) \hat{\psi}{H \beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)\right]\right\rangle_T \
= & -\operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\beta(\Omega-\hat{K})} \hat{T}\tau\left[\hat{\psi}^{}{H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau) \hat{\psi}{H \beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)\right]\right] \
= & -\theta\left(\tau-\tau’\right) \sum_n\left\langle n\left|\mathrm{e}^{\beta(\Omega-\hat{K})} \hat{\psi}^{}{H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau) \hat{\psi}{H \beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)\right| n\right\rangle \
& \mp \theta\left(\tau’-\tau\right) \sum_n\left\langle n\left|\mathrm{e}^{\beta(\Omega-\hat{K})} \hat{\psi}^{\dagger}{H \beta}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right) \hat{\psi}^{}{H\alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau)\right| n\right\rangle \
\equiv & I_1+I_2 .
\end{aligned}

\begin{aligned}
I_1 & =-\theta\left(\tau-\tau’\right) \sum_n\left\langle n\left|\mathrm{e}^{\beta(\Omega-\hat{K})} \hat{\psi}^{}{H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau) \hat{\psi}{H\beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)\right| n\right\rangle \
& =-\theta\left(\tau-\tau’\right) \sum_{m n}\left\langle n\left|\mathrm{e}^{\beta(\Omega-\hat{K})} \hat{\psi}^{}{H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau)\right| m\right\rangle\left\langle m\left|\hat{\psi}{H \beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)\right| n\right\rangle \
& =-\theta\left(\tau-\tau’\right) \mathrm{e}^{\beta \Omega} \sum_{m n} \mathrm{e}^{-K_n \beta}\left\langle n\left| \hat{\psi}^{}{H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau)\right| m\right\rangle\left\langle m\left|\hat{\psi}{H \beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)\right| n\right\rangle ,
\end{aligned}

\hat{\psi}{H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau)=\mathrm{e}^{\hat{K} \tau} \hat{\psi}\alpha(\boldsymbol{x}) \mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K} \tau},
$$
其中 $\hat{\psi}\alpha(\boldsymbol{x})$
\hat{\psi}\alpha(\boldsymbol{x})=\frac{1}{\sqrt{V}} \sum_k \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}} \hat{C}{k \alpha},

\hat{\psi}\alpha(0)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{V}} \sum_k \hat{C}{k \alpha}.

\hat{\boldsymbol{P}} =\sum{k \alpha} \boldsymbol{k} \hat{C}{k \alpha}^{\dagger} \hat{C}^{}{k \alpha} ,

\mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \hat{\boldsymbol{P}} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}} \hat{C}{k \alpha} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \hat{\boldsymbol{P}} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}}=\hat{C}{k \alpha} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}} .

\mathrm{e}^A B \mathrm{e}^{-A}=B+[A, B]-+\frac{1}{2 !}[A,[A, B]-]-+\frac{1}{3 !}[A,[A,[A, B]-]-]-+\cdots ,
$$
这里令 , $B=\hat{C}{k \alpha}$
\begin{aligned}
\mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \hat{\boldsymbol{P}} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}} \hat{C}{k \alpha} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \hat{\boldsymbol{P}} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}}&=\hat{C}{k \alpha}+\left[-\mathrm{i} \hat{\boldsymbol{P}} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}, \hat{C}{k \alpha}\right]-+\frac{1}{2 !}\left[-\mathrm{i} \hat{\boldsymbol{P}} \cdot \boldsymbol{x} ,\left[-\mathrm{i} \hat{\boldsymbol{P}} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}, \hat{C}{k \alpha}\right]-\right]-+\cdots \
& =\hat{C}{k \alpha}+(-\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{x})\left[\hat{\boldsymbol{P}}, \hat{C}{k \alpha}\right]-+\frac{1}{2 !}(-\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{x})^2\left[\hat{\boldsymbol{P}},\left[\hat{\boldsymbol{P}}, \hat{C}{k \alpha}\right]-\right]-+\cdots ,
\end{aligned}

\begin{aligned}
\left[\hat{\boldsymbol{P}}, \hat{C}^{}{k \alpha}\right]-&=\sum_{k’ \alpha’} \boldsymbol{k}’\left[\hat{C}{k’ \alpha’}^{\dagger} \hat{C}^{}{k’ \alpha’}, \hat{C}^{}{k \alpha}\right]- \
& =\sum_{k’ \alpha’} \boldsymbol{k}’\left[\hat{C}{k’ \alpha’}^{\dagger}, \hat{C}^{}{k \alpha}\right]- \hat{C}^{}{k’ \alpha’} \
& =-\boldsymbol{k} \hat{C}{k \alpha},
\end{aligned}

\begin{aligned}
\mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \hat{\boldsymbol{P}} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}} \hat{C}{k \alpha} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \hat{\boldsymbol{P}} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}}&=\hat{C}{k \alpha}+(-\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{x}) \cdot(-\boldsymbol{k}) \cdot \hat{C}{k \alpha}+\frac{1}{2 !} \cdot(-\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{x})^2 \cdot(-\boldsymbol{k})^{2} \cdot \hat{C}{k \alpha}+\cdots \
& =\hat{C}{k \alpha}\left[1+(\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{x} \cdot \boldsymbol{k})+\frac{1}{2 !}(\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{x} \cdot \boldsymbol{k})^2+\cdots\right] \
& =\hat{C}{k \alpha} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}} ,
\end{aligned}

\mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \hat{\boldsymbol{P}} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}} \hat{C}{k \alpha} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \hat{\boldsymbol{P}} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}}=\hat{C}{k \sigma} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}}.

\begin{aligned}
\hat{\psi}\alpha(\boldsymbol{x}) & =\frac{1}{\sqrt{V}} \sum{k } \hat{C}{k \alpha} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}}\
&=\frac{1}{\sqrt{V}} \sum_{k} \mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \hat{\boldsymbol{P}} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}} \hat{C}{k \alpha} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \hat{\boldsymbol{P}} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}}\
&=\mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \hat{\boldsymbol{P}} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}}\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{V}} \sum{k} \hat{C}_{k \alpha}\right) \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \hat{\boldsymbol{P}} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}} \
& =\mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \hat{\boldsymbol{P}} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}} \hat{\psi}\alpha(0) \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \hat{\boldsymbol{P}} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}}.
\end{aligned}

\begin{aligned}
\hat{\psi}{H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau)=&\mathrm{e}^{\hat{K} \tau} \hat{\psi}\alpha(\boldsymbol{x}) \mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K} \tau}=\mathrm{e}^{\hat{K} \tau} \mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \hat{\boldsymbol{P}} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}} \hat{\psi}\alpha(0) \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \hat{\boldsymbol{P}} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}} \mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K} \tau}\
=& \mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \hat{\boldsymbol{P}} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}}\mathrm{e}^{\hat{K} \tau} \hat{\psi}\alpha(0)\mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K} \tau} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \hat{\boldsymbol{P}} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}} ,
\end{aligned}

\left\langle n\left| \hat{\psi}{H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau)\right| m\right\rangle=\left\langle n\left|\mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \hat{\boldsymbol{P}} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}}\mathrm{e}^{\hat{K} \tau} \hat{\psi}\alpha(0)\mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K} \tau} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \hat{\boldsymbol{P}} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}}\right| m\right\rangle=\mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{P}{nm} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}}\mathrm{e}^{K{nm} \tau}\left\langle n\left|\hat{\psi}\alpha(0)\right| m\right\rangle,

K{n m} \equiv K_n-K_m, \quad \boldsymbol{P}{n m} \equiv \boldsymbol{P}_n-\boldsymbol{P}m .

\hat{\psi}^{\dagger}{H \beta}(\boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’)= \mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \hat{\boldsymbol{P}} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}’}\mathrm{e}^{\hat{K} \tau’} \hat{\psi}^{\dagger}_\beta(0)\mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K} \tau’} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \hat{\boldsymbol{P}} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}’} ,
$$

$$
\left\langle m\left| \hat{\psi}^{\dagger}{H \beta}(\boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’)\right| n\right\rangle=\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{P}{nm} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}’}\mathrm{e}^{-{K}{nm} \tau’}\left\langle m\left|\hat{\psi}^{\dagger}\beta(0)\right| n\right\rangle.

\begin{aligned}
I_1 =&-\theta\left(\tau-\tau’\right) \mathrm{e}^{\beta \Omega} \
&\sum{m n} \mathrm{e}^{-K_n \beta}\mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{P}{nm} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}}\mathrm{e}^{K_{nm} \tau}\left\langle n\left|\hat{\psi}^{}\alpha(0)\right| m\right\rangle \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{P}{nm} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}’}\mathrm{e}^{-K_{nm} \tau’}\left\langle m\left|\hat{\psi}\beta^{\dagger}(0)\right| n\right\rangle \
=&-\theta\left(\tau-\tau’\right) \mathrm{e}^{\beta \Omega} \sum{m n} \mathrm{e}^{-K_n \beta}\mathrm{e}^{K_{n m}\left(\tau-\tau’\right)} \mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{P}{n m} \cdot\left(\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}’\right)}\left\langle n\left|\hat{\psi}^{}\alpha(0)\right| m\right\rangle\left\langle m\left|\hat{\psi}\beta^{\dagger}(0)\right| n\right\rangle \
\xlongequal[]{\text{对调}n, m}&-\theta\left(\tau-\tau’\right) \mathrm{e}^{\beta \Omega} \sum{m n} \mathrm{e}^{-K_m \beta}\mathrm{e}^{-K{n m}\left(\tau-\tau’\right)} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{P}{n m} \cdot\left(\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}’\right)}\left\langle m\left|\hat{\psi}^{}\alpha(0)\right| n\right\rangle\left\langle n\left|\hat{\psi}\beta^{\dagger}(0)\right| m\right\rangle .
\end{aligned}

I_2=\mp \theta\left(\tau’-\tau\right) \mathrm{e}^{\beta \Omega} \sum{m n} \mathrm{e}^{-K_n \beta}\mathrm{e}^{K{n m}\left(\tau’-\tau\right)} \mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{P}{n m} \cdot\left(\boldsymbol{x}’-\boldsymbol{x}\right)}\left\langle n\left|\hat{\psi}\beta^{\dagger}(0)\right| m\right\rangle\left\langle m\left|\hat{\psi}^{}\alpha(0)\right| n\right\rangle ,

\begin{aligned}
&\mathcal{G}{\alpha \beta}\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau ; \boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)\
=& -\theta\left(\tau-\tau’\right) \mathrm{e}^{\beta \Omega} \sum{m n} \mathrm{e}^{-K_m \beta}\mathrm{e}^{-K{n m}\left(\tau-\tau’\right)} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{P}{n m} \cdot\left(\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}’\right)} \left\langle m\left|\hat{\psi}^{}\alpha(0)\right| n\right\rangle\left\langle n\left|\hat{\psi}\beta^{\dagger}(0)\right| m\right\rangle \
&\mp \theta\left(\tau’-\tau\right) \mathrm{e}^{\beta \Omega} \sum{m n} \mathrm{e}^{-K_n \beta}\mathrm{e}^{K{n m}\left(\tau’-\tau\right)} \mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{P}{n m} \cdot\left(\boldsymbol{x}’-\boldsymbol{x}\right)}\left\langle n\left|\hat{\psi}_\beta^{\dagger}(0)\right| m\right\rangle\left\langle m\left|\hat{\psi}^{}_\alpha(0)\right| n\right\rangle ,
\end{aligned}
$$
整体只有 时的项不为零.

下面计算动量空间中的格林函数, 前面已经讨论过单粒子松原格林函数的傅里叶变换可以只用 的部分表示, 有:
$$
\begin{aligned}
\mathcal{G}{\alpha \beta}\left(\boldsymbol{k}, \mathrm{i} \omega_n\right)=&\int_0^\beta \mathrm{d}\left(\tau-\tau’\right) \int \mathrm{d}\left(\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}’\right)\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \omega_n\left(\tau-\tau’\right)} \mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k} \cdot\left(\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}’\right)}\mathcal{G}{\alpha \beta}\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau ; \boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right) \
=& -\int_0^\beta \mathrm{d}\left(\tau-\tau’\right) \int \mathrm{d}\left(\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}’\right) \mathrm{e}^{\beta \Omega} \sum_{m n} \mathrm{e}^{-K_m \beta}\left\langle m\left|\hat{\psi}\alpha(0)\right| n\right\rangle\left\langle n\left|\hat{\psi}\beta^{\dagger}(0)\right| m\right\rangle \
& \times\mathrm{e}^{-K{n m}\left(\tau-\tau’\right)} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{P}{n m} \cdot\left(\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}’\right)} \mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k} \cdot\left(\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}’\right)} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \omega_n\left(\tau-\tau’\right)} \
= & -\int_0^\beta \mathrm{d}\left(\tau-\tau’\right) \int \mathrm{d}\left(\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}’\right) \mathrm{e}^{\beta \Omega} \sum_{m n} \mathrm{e}^{-K_m \beta}\left\langle m\left|\hat{\psi}^{}\alpha(0)\right| n\right\rangle\left\langle n\left|\hat{\psi}\beta^{\dagger}(0)\right| m\right\rangle \
& \times\mathrm{e}^{\left(\mathrm{i} \omega_n-K{n m}\right)\left(\tau-\tau’\right)} \mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \left(\boldsymbol{k}-\boldsymbol{P}{n m}\right) \cdot\left(\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}’\right)} \
= & -\mathrm{e}^{\beta \Omega} \sum_{m n} \mathrm{e}^{-K_m \beta}(2 \pi)^3 \delta\left(\boldsymbol{k}-\boldsymbol{P}{n m}\right)\
& ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ \times\left.\left\langle m\left|\hat{\psi}^{}\alpha(0)\right| n\right\rangle\left\langle n\left|\hat{\psi}\beta^{\dagger}(0)\right| m\right\rangle \frac{\mathrm{e}^{\left(i \omega_n-K{n m}\right)\left(\tau-\tau’\right)}}{\mathrm{i} \omega_n-K{n m}}\right|{\tau-\tau’=0} ^\beta \
= & -(2 \pi)^3 \mathrm{e}^{\beta \Omega} \sum_{m n} \mathrm{e}^{-{K}m \beta} \delta\left(\boldsymbol{k}-\boldsymbol{P}{n m}\right)\left\langle m\left|\hat{\psi}^{}\alpha(0)\right| n\right\rangle\left\langle n\left|\hat{\psi}\beta^{\dagger}(0)\right| m\right\rangle \frac{\mathrm{e}^{\left(\mathrm{i} \omega_n-K{n m}\right) \beta}-1}{\mathrm{i} \omega_n-K{n m}} \
= & (2 \pi)^3 \mathrm{e}^{\beta \Omega} \sum_{m n} \mathrm{e}^{-{K}m \beta} \delta\left(\boldsymbol{k}-\boldsymbol{P}{n m}\right)\left\langle m\left|\hat{\psi}^{}\alpha(0)\right| n\right\rangle\left\langle n\left|\hat{\psi}\beta^{\dagger}(0)\right| m\right\rangle \frac{1 \mp \mathrm{e}^{-\beta K{n m}}}{\mathrm{i} \omega_n-K{n m}},
\end{aligned}
$$
这里最后考虑了对于玻色子体系和费米子体系具体的松原频率. 可以看出相比于零温情况, 有限温度下的单粒子松原格林函数的 Lehmann 表示只包含一项, 其形式似乎更简单.

同样地, 可以引入谱函数:
$$
\begin{aligned}
A_{\alpha \beta}(\boldsymbol{k}, \omega)=(2 \pi)^3 \mathrm{e}^{\beta \Omega} \sum_{m n}& \mathrm{e}^{-{K}m \beta}\left\langle m\left|\hat{\psi}^{}\alpha(0)\right| n\right\rangle\left\langle n\left|\hat{\psi}\beta^{\dagger}(0)\right| m\right\rangle\
& \times\left(1 \mp \mathrm{e}^{-\beta K{n m}}\right) \delta\left(\boldsymbol{k}-\boldsymbol{P}{n m}\right) \delta\left(\omega-K{n m}\right),
\end{aligned}

\mathcal{G}{\alpha \beta}\left(\boldsymbol{k}, \mathrm{i} \omega_n\right)=\int{-\infty}^{\infty} \mathrm{d} \omega’ \frac{A_{\alpha \beta}\left(\boldsymbol{k}, \omega’\right)}{\mathrm{i} \omega_n-\omega’} .

\begin{aligned}
\mathcal{G}\left(\boldsymbol{k}, \mathrm{i} \omega_n\right)=&\frac{1}{2 S+1} \sum_\alpha \mathcal{G}{\alpha \alpha}\left(\boldsymbol{k}, \mathrm{i} \omega_n\right), \
=&\frac{(2 \pi)^3}{2 S+1}\mathrm{e}^{\beta \Omega}\sum_\alpha \sum{m n} \mathrm{e}^{-{K}m \beta}\delta\left(\boldsymbol{k}-\boldsymbol{P}{n m}\right)\frac{1 \mp \mathrm{e}^{-\beta K_{n m}}}{\mathrm{i} \omega_n-K_{n m}}\left|\left\langle m\left|\hat{\psi}(0)\right| n\right\rangle\right|^2,
\end{aligned}

\begin{aligned}
A(\boldsymbol{k}, \omega)=\frac{(2 \pi)^3}{2 S+1}\mathrm{e}^{\beta \Omega} \sum_\alpha \sum_{m n} &\mathrm{e}^{-{K}m \beta} \left|\left\langle m\left|\hat{\psi}(0)\right| n\right\rangle\right|^2\
& \times\delta\left(\boldsymbol{k}-\boldsymbol{P}{n m}\right)\left(1 \mp \mathrm{e}^{-\beta K_{n m}}\right) \delta\left(\omega-K_{n m}\right),
\end{aligned}

\mathcal{G}\left(\boldsymbol{k}, \mathrm{i} \omega_n\right)=\int_{-\infty}^{\infty} \mathrm{d} \omega’ \frac{A\left(\boldsymbol{k}, \omega’\right)}{\mathrm{i} \omega_n-\omega’} .
$$
下一节将证明 是归一化的. 可以看到, 单粒子松原格林函数的 Lehmann 表示与粒子态密度相关.

其他单粒子热力学格林函数(实时)

引入 Lehmann 表示后可以很方便地讨论有限温度下三个热力学格林函数间的关系以及它们与松原格林函数的关系.

其他单粒子热力学格林函数的定义

因果格林函数
$$
\begin{aligned}
\mathrm{i} G_{\alpha \beta}\left(\boldsymbol{x}, t ; \boldsymbol{x}’, t’\right)T & \equiv \operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\beta(\Omega-\hat{K})} \hat{T}t\left[\hat{\psi}^{}{H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, t) \hat{\psi}{H \beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’, t’\right)\right]\right]\
&=\left\langle \hat{T}t\left[\hat{\psi}^{}{H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, t) \hat{\psi}_{H \beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’, t’\right)\right]\right\rangle_T.
\end{aligned}
$$
取 时应得到零温格林函数.

推迟格林函数
$$
G_{\alpha \beta}^R\left(\boldsymbol{x}, t ; \boldsymbol{x}’, t’\right) \equiv - \mathrm{i} \theta\left(t-t’\right) \operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\beta(\Omega-\hat{K})}\left[\hat{\psi}^{}{H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, t), \hat{\psi}{H \beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’, t’\right)\right]_{\mp}\right].
$$

超前格林函数
$$
G_{\alpha \beta}^A\left(\boldsymbol{x}, t ; \boldsymbol{x}’, t’\right) \equiv \mathrm{i} \theta\left(t’-t\right) \operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\beta(\Omega-\hat{K})}\left[\hat{\psi}^{}{H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, t), \hat{\psi}{H \beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’, t’\right)\right]_{\mp}\right].
$$

其他单粒子热力学格林函数的 Lehmann 表示

考虑相互作用与自旋无关, 可以得到上述三种单粒子热力学格林函数的 Lehmann 表示.

  • 因果格林函数:
    实部与虚部分别为:
    $$
    \left{\begin{aligned}
    \operatorname{Re} G(\boldsymbol{k}, \omega)T&=\mathcal{P} \int{-\infty}^{\infty} \mathrm{d} \omega’ \frac{A\left(\boldsymbol{k}, \omega’\right)}{\omega-\omega’} ,\
    \operatorname{Im} G(\boldsymbol{k}, \omega)T&=-\pi A(\boldsymbol{k}, \omega) \frac{1 \pm \mathrm{e}^{-K{n m} \beta}}{1 \mp \mathrm{e}^{-K_{n m} \beta}}=-\pi A(\boldsymbol{k}, \omega) \left[\tanh\left(\frac{\beta \omega}{2}\right)\right] ^{\mp 1},
    \end{aligned}\right.

    \operatorname{Re} G(\boldsymbol{k}, \omega)T=-\frac{\mathcal{P}}{\pi} \int{-\infty}^{\infty} \mathrm{d} \omega’ \frac{\operatorname{Im} G\left(\boldsymbol{k}, \omega’\right)_T}{\omega-\omega’} \left[\tanh \left(\frac{\beta \omega’}{2}\right)\right]^{\pm 1} ,
    $$
    此即色散关系.
  • 推迟格林函数:

    可得实部与虚部分别为:
    $$
    \left{\right.

    \operatorname{Re} G^R(\boldsymbol{k}, \omega)=-\frac{\mathcal{P}}{\pi} \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} \mathrm{d} \omega’ \frac{\operatorname{Im} G^R\left(\boldsymbol{k}, \omega’\right)}{\omega-\omega’} .
    $$
  • 超前格林函数:

    可得实部与虚部分别为:
    $$
    \left{\right.

    \operatorname{Re} G^A(\boldsymbol{k}, \omega)=\frac{\mathcal{P}}{\pi} \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} \mathrm{d} \omega’ \frac{\operatorname{Im} G^A\left(\boldsymbol{k}, \omega’\right)}{\omega-\omega’} .
    $$

可见, 只要知道了谱函数 , 就能得到所有的格林函数: , , , .

作业
证明:

各种单粒子格林函数间的关系

相互作用与自旋无关时, 不同的格林函数之间满足关系:
$$
\left{\begin{aligned}
G^A(\boldsymbol{k}, \omega)&=\left[G^R(\boldsymbol{k}, \omega)\right]^*,\
\operatorname{Re} G(\boldsymbol{k}, \omega)T&=\operatorname{Re} G^R(\boldsymbol{k}, \omega)=\operatorname{Re} G^A(\boldsymbol{k}, \omega), \
\operatorname{Im} G(\boldsymbol{k}, \omega)T&=\operatorname{Im} G^R(\boldsymbol{k}, \omega)\left[\tanh\left(\frac{\beta \omega}{2}\right)\right] ^{\mp 1}=-\operatorname{Im} G^A(\boldsymbol{k}, \omega) \left[\tanh\left(\frac{\beta \omega}{2}\right)\right] ^{\mp 1} .
\end{aligned}\right.

G^R(\boldsymbol{k}, \omega)=\mathcal{G}\left(\boldsymbol{k}, \mathrm{i} \omega_n \rightarrow \omega+\mathrm{i} \eta\right)=\int{-\infty}^{\infty} \mathrm{d} \omega’ \frac{A\left(\boldsymbol{k}, \omega’\right)}{\omega-\omega’+\mathrm{i} \eta},

\left{\begin{aligned}
\mathcal{G}\left(\boldsymbol{k}, \mathrm{i} \omega_n \right)&\left.=G^R(\boldsymbol{k}, \omega)\right|{\omega\to\mathrm{i} \omega_n \atop(\omega_n>0)},\
\mathcal{G}\left(\boldsymbol{k}, \mathrm{i} \omega_n \right)&\left.=G^A(\boldsymbol{k}, \omega)\right|_{\omega\to\mathrm{i} \omega_n \atop(\omega_n< 0)}.
\end{aligned}\right.
$$
通常我们先利用有限温度下的费曼图技术得到松原格林函数的解析结果, 进一步得到热力学推迟格林函数, 而后得到全部的热力学格林函数.

最后, 我们证明谱函数 是归一化的.

一方面, 当相互作用与自旋无关时, 推迟格林函数可表示为:
$$
G^R\left(\boldsymbol{x}, t \right) = - \mathrm{i} \theta(t)\sum\limits_{\alpha}\frac{1}{2S+1}\operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\beta(\Omega-\hat{K})}\left[\hat{\psi}^{}{H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, t), \hat{\psi}{H \alpha}^{\dagger}\left(0,0\right)\right]{\mp}\right],

\begin{aligned}
G^R\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \eta \right) =& - \mathrm{i} \sum\limits{\alpha}\frac{1}{2S+1}\operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\beta(\Omega-\hat{K})}\left[\hat{\psi}^{}{H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, 0), \hat{\psi}{H \alpha}^{\dagger}\left(0,0\right)\right]{\mp}\right]\
=&- \mathrm{i} \sum\limits{\alpha}\frac{1}{2S+1}\operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\beta(\Omega-\hat{K})}\right] \delta(\boldsymbol x)\
=&-\mathrm{i} \delta(\boldsymbol x),
\end{aligned}

G^R\left(\boldsymbol{k}, \eta \right)= \int\mathrm{d}\boldsymbol{x}\mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k}\cdot\boldsymbol{x}}G^R\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \eta \right)=-\mathrm{i} .



\int_{-\infty}^{\infty} A\left(\boldsymbol{k}, \omega’\right)\mathrm{d}\omega’=1,
$$
即谱函数归一.

相互作用绘景下的单粒子松原格林函数

有限温度下相互作用绘景中的格林函数是后面微扰计算的基础, 与零温时的方法相同, 需要得到海森堡绘景下的场算符和相互作用绘景中的场算符间的关系.

有限温相互作用绘景中的算符

在巨正则系综中, 考虑

由此可以定义有限温情况下相互作用绘景中算符(为方便, 暂时不考虑自旋):

其中 是薛定谔绘景中的算符, 是相互作用绘景中的算符, 可以得到:
$$
\hat{A}_S=\mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K}_0 \tau} \hat{A}_I(\tau) \mathrm{e}^{\hat{K}0 \tau}.

\hat{A}{H}(\tau)= \mathrm{e}^{\hat{K}\tau}\hat{A}S\mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K}\tau},

\hat{A}{H}(\tau)= \mathrm{e}^{\hat{K}\tau}\mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K}_0 \tau} \hat{A}_I(\tau) \mathrm{e}^{\hat{K}_0 \tau}\mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K}\tau}.\quad(1)
$$

有限温相互作用绘景中的“时间”演化算符

类似于零温情况, 可以定义有限温相互作用绘景中的“时间”演化算符, 也就是“虚时”演化算符:

注意这里 的变化范围是 . “虚时”演化算符不是幺正算符, 有如下性质：

  • 归一性
  • 传递性
  • 逆算符

由归一性和传递性, 有

由此可以定义逆算符:

这里算符的逆是指对于任意算符 , 如果存在算符 满足: , , 则称 是 的逆, 记为 .

  • 重要关系式

    这两项关系在下面计算有限温相互作用绘景中算符与海森堡绘景中算符间的关系时十分重要. 将该式代入式(1), 可得
    $$
    \begin{aligned}
    \hat{A}_K(\tau) & =\mathrm{e}^{\hat{K} \tau} \hat{A}_S \mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K} \tau}=\mathrm{e}^{\hat{K} \tau}\left[\mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K}0 \tau} \hat{A}I(\tau) \mathrm{e}^{\hat{K}0 \tau}\right] \mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K} \tau} \
    & =\hat{S}(0, \tau) \hat{A}I(\tau) \hat{S}(\tau, 0).
    \end{aligned}

    \left{\begin{aligned}
    \hat{\psi}    {H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau)&=\hat{S}(0, \tau)\hat{\psi}    {I \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau)\hat{S}(\tau, 0), \
    \hat{\psi}    {H \alpha}^{\dagger}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau)&=\hat{S}(0, \tau)\hat{\psi}    {I \alpha}^{\dagger}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau) \hat{S}(\tau, 0),
    \end{aligned}\right.



    \int_0^\tau \frac{\partial}{\partial \tau’}\hat{S}(\tau’, 0)\mathrm{d} \tau’=-\int_0^\tau \hat{H}_I’(\tau’) \hat{S}(\tau’, 0)\mathrm{d} \tau’,

    \int_0^\tau \frac{\partial}{\partial \tau’}\hat{S}(\tau’, 0)\mathrm{d} \tau’=\hat{S}(\tau, 0)-\mathbf{1},

    \begin{aligned}
    \hat{S}(\tau, 0) & =\mathbf{1}-\int_0^\tau \hat{H}I’(\tau’) \hat{S}\left(\tau’, 0\right) \mathrm{d} \tau’ \
    & =\sum    {n=0}^{\infty} \frac{(-1)^n}{n !} \int_0^\tau \mathrm{d} \tau_1 \int_0^\tau \mathrm{d} \tau_2 \cdots \int_0^\tau \mathrm{d} \tau_n \hat{T}_\tau\left[\hat{H}_I’\left(\tau_1\right) \hat{H}_I’\left(\tau_2\right) \cdots \hat{H}_I’\left(\tau_n\right)\right] \
    & =\hat{T}_\tau \mathrm{e}xp \left[-\int_0^\tau \mathrm{d} \tau \hat{H}_I’\left(\tau’\right)\right] .
    \end{aligned}

    \mathrm{e}^{-\beta \hat{K}}=\mathrm{e}^{-\beta \hat{K}_0} \hat{S}(\beta, 0).

    \mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K}\tau}=\mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K}_0\tau}\mathrm{e}^{\hat{K}_0\tau}\mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K}\tau}=\mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K}_0 \tau} \hat{S}(\beta, 0),

    \mathrm{e}^{-\beta \hat{K}}=\mathrm{e}^{-\beta \hat{K}_0} \hat{S}(\beta, 0).
    $$

    相互作用绘景下单粒子松原格林函数的表达式

    下面考虑利用相互作用绘景中的场算符表示有限温度下的松原格林函数. 首先, 配分函数可以表示为:
    $$
    \Xi=\operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{-\beta \hat{K}}\right]=\operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\beta \hat{K}0} \hat{S}(\beta, 0)\right]=\mathrm{e}^{-\beta \Omega}.

    \begin{aligned}
    \mathcal{G}    {\alpha \beta}\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau ; \boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right) \equiv & -\operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\beta(\Omega-\hat{K})} \hat{T}\tau\left[\hat{\psi}^{}{H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau) \hat{\psi}{H \beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)\right]\right] \
    = & -\theta\left(\tau-\tau’\right) \operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\beta(\Omega-\hat{K})} \hat{\psi}^{}    {H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau) \hat{\psi}{H \beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)\right] \
    & \mp \theta\left(\tau’-\tau\right) \operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\beta(\Omega-\hat{K})} \hat{\psi}    {H \beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right) \hat{\psi}^{}_{H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau)\right],
    \end{aligned}
    $$
    分别考虑 和 的情况.

当 时, 只取第一项:
$$
\begin{aligned}
&\mathcal{G}{\alpha \beta}\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau ; \boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right) \
=& -\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}^{-\beta \Omega}} \operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{-\beta \hat{K}} \hat{\psi}^{}{H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau) \hat{\psi}{H \beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)\right] \
=& -\frac{\operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{-\beta \hat{K}} \hat{\psi}^{}{H \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau) \hat{\psi}_{H \beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)\right]}{\operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{-\beta \hat{K}0} \hat{S}(\beta, 0)\right]} \
=& -\frac{\operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{-\beta \hat{K}0} \hat{S}(\beta, 0) \hat{S}(0, \tau) \hat{\psi}^{}{I \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau) \hat{S}(\tau, 0) \hat{S}\left(0, \tau’\right) \hat{\psi}{I \beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right) \hat{S}\left(\tau’, 0\right)\right]}{\operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{-\beta \hat{K}0} \hat{S}(\beta, 0)\right]} \
=& -\frac{\operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{-\beta \hat{K}0} \hat{S}(\beta, \tau) \hat{\psi}^{}{I \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau) \hat{S}\left(\tau, \tau’\right) \hat{\psi}{I \beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right) \hat{S}\left(\tau’, 0\right)\right]}{\operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{-\beta \hat{K}_0} \hat{S}(\beta, 0)\right]},
\end{aligned}



\langle\cdots\rangle_0=\operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\beta\left(\Omega_0-\hat{K}_0\right)} \cdots\right] .




$$
与 情况结果一样.

这样就得到了相互作用绘景中单粒子松原格林函数的表达式:
$$
\mathcal{G}{\alpha \beta}\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau ; \boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)=\frac{-\left\langle\hat{T}\tau\left[\hat{\psi}^{}{I \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau) \hat{\psi}{I \beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right) \hat{S}(\beta, 0)\right]\right\rangle_0}{\langle\hat{S}(\beta, 0)\rangle_0},

\hat{\psi}_{I\alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau)=\mathrm{e}^{\hat{K}_0 \tau} \hat{\psi}_\alpha(\boldsymbol{x}) \mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K}_0 \tau},
$$


注意这里的均值是自由粒子体系中巨正则系综下的平均值. 特别地, 在自由粒子体系中 $S(\hat{\beta}, 0)=\mathrm{e}^{\hat{K}0 \tau} \mathrm{e}^{-\hat{K}0 \tau}=1$
\mathcal{G}{\alpha \beta}^0\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau ; \boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)=-\left\langle\hat{T}\tau\left[\hat{\psi}^{}{I \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau) \hat{\psi}{I \beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)\right]\right\rangle_0.
$$
同零温时的情况一样, 将格林函数在相互作用绘景中表示出来后, 我们要引入 Wick 定理进行进一步的计算.

Wick 定理

考虑有限温度下相互作用绘景中的场算符 , , 可以定义这两个场算符间的收缩为:

tu

注意这里不同于零温的情况, 收缩是用自由粒子体系中的统计平均定义的, 没有引入正规乘积.

自由粒子体系中令 $A=\hat{\psi}{I \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau), B=\hat{\psi}{I \beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)$ 时,

tu

这一公式是后面总结费曼图规则的基础. 注意到, 此时

tu

有限温度下的 Wick 定理

偶数个相互作用绘景下场算符“虚时”编时乘积的统计平均值(自由粒子情况下)可以表示成如下形式:

tu

这里求和包括所有可能的收缩, 是收缩过程中算符交换的次数.

例: 计算 :

tu

下面我们以四个场算符的情况为例来证明有限温度下的 Wick 定理, 这一方法可以推广到更多偶数个算符的情况.

假设 , 如果实际四个算符不满足这一条件, 总是可以经过有限次调换使其满足这一要求, 结果最多相差一个负号. 场算符的坐标并不影响收缩的结果, 以下为方便讨论暂时不考虑坐标, 这样只需证明:

这一式的证明可以考虑场算符总能用产生(消灭)算符展开为:
$$
A(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau)=\sum_i \varphi_i(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau) \hat{\alpha}i ,

\begin{aligned}
\hat{\psi}{I \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau)&=\frac{1}{\sqrt{V}} \sum_k \hat{C}{k \alpha} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}-\left(\epsilon_k^0-\mu\right) \tau};\
\hat{\psi}{I \beta}^{\dagger}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau)&=\frac{1}{\sqrt{V}} \sum_k \hat{C}_{k \beta}^{\dagger} \mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} \boldsymbol{k} \cdot \boldsymbol{x}+\left(\epsilon_k^0-\mu\right) \tau} .
\end{aligned}



\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_a \hat{\alpha}_b \hat{\alpha}_c \hat{\alpha}_d\right\rangle_0=\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_a \hat{\alpha}_b\right\rangle_0\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_c \hat{\alpha}_d\right\rangle_0 \pm\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_a \hat{\alpha}_c\right\rangle_0\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_b \hat{\alpha}_d\right\rangle_0+\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_a \hat{\alpha}_d\right\rangle_0\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_b \hat{\alpha}_c\right\rangle_0 .

\begin{aligned}
\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_a \hat{\alpha}_b \hat{\alpha}_c \hat{\alpha}_d\right\rangle_0 & =\left\langle\left(\left[\hat{\alpha}_a, \hat{\alpha}b\right]{\mp} \pm \hat{\alpha}_b \hat{\alpha}_a\right) \hat{\alpha}_c \hat{\alpha}_d\right\rangle_0 \
& =\left[\hat{\alpha}_a, \hat{\alpha}b\right]{\mp}\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_c \hat{\alpha}_d\right\rangle_0 \pm\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_b \hat{\alpha}_a \hat{\alpha}_c \hat{\alpha}_d\right\rangle_0 \
& =\left[\hat{\alpha}_a, \hat{\alpha}b\right]{\mp}\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_c \hat{\alpha}_d\right\rangle_0 \pm\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_b\left(\left[\hat{\alpha}_a \hat{\alpha}c\right]{\mp} \pm \hat{\alpha}_c \hat{\alpha}_a\right) \hat{\alpha}_d\right\rangle_0 \
& =\left[\hat{\alpha}_a, \hat{\alpha}b\right]{\mp}\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_c \hat{\alpha}_d\right\rangle_0 \pm\left[\hat{\alpha}_a, \hat{\alpha}c\right]{\mp}\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_b \hat{\alpha}_d\right\rangle_0+\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_b \hat{\alpha}_c \hat{\alpha}_a \hat{\alpha}_d\right\rangle_0 \
& =\left[\hat{\alpha}_a, \hat{\alpha}b\right]{\mp}\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_c \hat{\alpha}_d\right\rangle_0 \pm\left[\hat{\alpha}_a, \hat{\alpha}c\right]{\mp}\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_b \hat{\alpha}_d\right\rangle_0+\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_b \hat{\alpha}_c\left(\left[\hat{\alpha}_a, \hat{\alpha}d\right]{\mp} \pm \hat{\alpha}_d \hat{\alpha}_a\right)\right\rangle_0 \
& =\left[\hat{\alpha}_a, \hat{\alpha}b\right]{\mp}\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_c \hat{\alpha}_d\right\rangle_0 \pm\left[\hat{\alpha}_a, \hat{\alpha}c\right]{\mp}\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_b \hat{\alpha}_d\right\rangle_0+\left[\hat{\alpha}_a, \hat{\alpha}d\right]{\mp}\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_b \hat{\alpha}_c\right\rangle_0 \pm\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_b \hat{\alpha}_c \hat{\alpha}_d \hat{\alpha}_a\right\rangle_0,
\end{aligned}

\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_a \hat{\alpha}_b \hat{\alpha}_c \hat{\alpha}_d\right\rangle_0 \mp\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_b \hat{\alpha}_c \hat{\alpha}_d \hat{\alpha}_a\right\rangle_0=\left[\hat{\alpha}_a, \hat{\alpha}b\right]{\mp}\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_c \hat{\alpha}_d\right\rangle_0 \pm\left[\hat{\alpha}_a, \hat{\alpha}c\right]{\mp}\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_b \hat{\alpha}_d\right\rangle_0+\left[\hat{\alpha}_a, \hat{\alpha}d\right]{\mp}\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_b \hat{\alpha}_c\right\rangle_0.\quad(2)



\lambda_a=

\mathrm{e}^{\beta \hat{K}_0} \hat{\alpha}_a \mathrm{e}^{-\beta \hat{K}_0}=\mathrm{e}^{\lambda_a \beta\left(\varepsilon_a^0-\mu\right)}\hat{\alpha}_a,
$$
可以由算符间的对易关系得到.

把上面结果代回式(2), 并把前面的常数因子移到右边, 可以得到:
$$
\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_a \hat{\alpha}_b \hat{\alpha}_c \hat{\alpha}_d\right\rangle_0=\frac{\left[\hat{\alpha}_a, \hat{\alpha}b\right]{\mp}\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_c \hat{\alpha}_d\right\rangle_0}{1 \mp \mathrm{e}^{\lambda_a \beta\left(\varepsilon_a^0-\mu\right)}} \pm \frac{\left[\hat{\alpha}_a, \hat{\alpha}c\right]{\mp}\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_b \hat{\alpha}_d\right\rangle_0}{1 \mp \mathrm{e}^{\lambda_a \beta\left(\varepsilon_a^0-\mu\right)}}+\frac{\left[\hat{\alpha}_a, \hat{\alpha}d\right]{\mp}\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_b \hat{\alpha}_c\right\rangle_0}{1 \mp \mathrm{e}^{\lambda_a \beta\left(\varepsilon_a^0-\mu\right)}} .

\frac{\left[\hat{\alpha}_a, \hat{\alpha}b\right]{\mp}}{1 \mp \mathrm{e}^{\lambda_a \beta\left(\varepsilon_a^0-\mu\right)}}=\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_a \hat{\alpha}_b\right\rangle_0,\quad(3)
$$
其它项显然与上式有相同的关系. 上式的证明有两种方法:

方法一:
$$
\begin{aligned}
{\left[\hat{\alpha}_a, \hat{\alpha}b\right]{\mp} } & =\left\langle\left[\hat{\alpha}_a, \hat{\alpha}b\right]{\mp}\right\rangle_0 \
& =\left\langle\left(\hat{\alpha}_a \hat{\alpha}_b \mp \hat{\alpha}_b \hat{\alpha}_a\right)\right\rangle_0 \
& =\operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\beta\left(\Omega_0-\hat{K}_0\right)} \hat{\alpha}_a \hat{\alpha}_b\right] \mp \operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\beta\left(\Omega_0-\hat{K}_0\right)} \hat{\alpha}_b \hat{\alpha}_a\right] \
& =\mathrm{e}^{\beta \Omega_0} \operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{-\beta \hat{K}_0} \hat{\alpha}_a \hat{\alpha}_b\right] \mp \mathrm{e}^{\beta \Omega_0} \operatorname{Tr}\left[\hat{\alpha}_a \mathrm{e}^{-\beta \hat{K}_0} \hat{\alpha}_b\right] \
& =\mathrm{e}^{\beta \Omega_0} \operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{-\beta \hat{K}_0} \hat{\alpha}_a \hat{\alpha}_b\right] \mp \mathrm{e}^{\beta \Omega_0} \operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{-\beta \hat{K}_0} \mathrm{e}^{\beta \hat{K}_0} \hat{\alpha}_a \mathrm{e}^{-\beta \hat{K}_0} \hat{\alpha}_b\right] \
& =\mathrm{e}^{\beta \Omega_0} \operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{-\beta \hat{K}_0} \hat{\alpha}_a \hat{\alpha}_b\right] \mp \mathrm{e}^{\beta \Omega_0} \operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{-\beta \hat{K}_0} \mathrm{e}^{\lambda_a \beta\left(\varepsilon_a^0-\mu\right)} \hat{\alpha}_a \hat{\alpha}_b\right] \
& =\left(1 \mp \mathrm{e}^{\lambda_a \beta\left(\varepsilon_a^0-\mu\right)}\right) \operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{\beta\left(\Omega_0-\hat{K}_0\right)} \hat{\alpha}_a \hat{\alpha}_b\right] \
& =\left(1 \mp \mathrm{e}^{\lambda_a \beta\left(\varepsilon_a^0-\mu\right)}\right)\left\langle\hat{\alpha}_a \hat{\alpha}_b\right\rangle_0.
\end{aligned}
$$
方法二: 穷举法

  • 和 均为产生或均为消灭算符时, 式(3)两边都为零, 等式显然成立.
  • 和 中一个是产生算符另一个是消灭算符, 但 时, 式(3)两边也都为零, 等式显然成立.
  • 是消灭算符 , 是产生算符 , 此时 . 分别计算式(3)左右两边得到:
    $$
    \begin{aligned}
    \text {左边} & =\frac{\left[\hat{C}^{}_\alpha, \hat{C}\alpha^{\dagger}\right]{\mp}}{1 \mp \mathrm{e}^{-\beta\left(\varepsilon_a^0-\mu\right)}}=\frac{1}{1 \mp \mathrm{e}^{-\beta\left(\varepsilon_a^0-\mu\right)}}= \frac{\mathrm{e}^{\beta\left(\varepsilon_a^0-\mu\right)}}{\mathrm{e}^{\beta\left(\varepsilon_a^0-\mu\right)} \mp 1} \
    & =\frac{\mathrm{e}^{\beta\left(\varepsilon_a^0-\mu\right)} \mp 1 \pm 1}{\mathrm{e}^{\beta\left(\varepsilon_a^0-\mu\right)} \mp 1}=1 \pm \frac{1}{\mathrm{e}^{\beta\left(\varepsilon_a^0-\mu\right)} \mp 1}=1 \pm n_\alpha^0 ,\
    \text {右边}&=\left\langle\hat{C}^{}_\alpha \hat{C}_\alpha^{\dagger}\right\rangle_0=\left\langle 1 \pm \hat{C}_\alpha^{\dagger} \hat{C}^{}_\alpha\right\rangle_0=1 \pm n_\alpha^0=\text {左边},
    \end{aligned}
    $$
    即式(3)成立.
  • 是产生算符 , 是消灭算符 , 此时 . 同样分别计算式(3)左右两边得到:
    $$
    \begin{aligned}
    \text {左边}&=\frac{\left[\hat{C}_\alpha^{\dagger}, \hat{C}^{}\alpha\right]{\mp}}{1 \mp \mathrm{e}^{\beta\left(\varepsilon_a^0-\mu\right)}}=\frac{-1}{1 \mp \mathrm{e}^{\beta\left(\varepsilon_a^0-\mu\right)}}=n_\alpha^0 , \
    \text {右边}&=\left\langle\hat{C}_\alpha^{\dagger} \hat{C}^{}_\alpha\right\rangle_0=n_\alpha^0=\text {左边},
    \end{aligned}
    $$
    即(3)成立.

综上所述, 式(3)成立, 从而四个算符情况下的 Wick 定理成立. 对于更多偶数个场算符的 Wick 定理证明方法是类似的.

按有限温度下收缩的定义, 考虑相互作用绘景中场算符, 有:

tu

故在微扰计算中利用 Wick 定理时, 只需要考虑产生和消灭算符间的收缩.

例: 计算下面四个费米子算符的统计平均(暂不考虑自旋):

tu

下面利用 Wick 定理展开相互作用绘景中的松原格林函数:
$$
\mathcal{G}{\alpha \beta}\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau ; \boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)=-\frac{\left\langle\hat{T}\tau\left[\hat{\psi}^{}{I \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau) \hat{\psi}{I \beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right) \hat{S}(\beta, 0)\right]\right\rangle_0}{\langle\hat{S}(\beta, 0)\rangle_0},

\hat{S}(\beta, 0)=\hat{T}_\tau \mathrm{e}xp \left[-\int_0^\beta \mathrm{d} \tau’ \hat{H}_I’\left(\tau’\right)\right].

\hat{H}I’\left(\tau_1\right)=\frac{1}{2} \sum\limits{\alpha\beta}\iint \mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x}_1 \mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x}2 \hat{\psi}{I \alpha}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}1, \tau_1\right) \hat{\psi}{I \beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}_2, \tau_2\right) V\left(\boldsymbol{x}_1- \boldsymbol{x}2\right) \hat{\psi}^{}{I \beta}\left(\boldsymbol{x}2, \tau_2\right) \hat{\psi}^{}{I \alpha}\left(\boldsymbol{x}_1, \tau_1\right) ,

U\left(\boldsymbol{x}_1-\boldsymbol{x}_2, \tau_1-\tau_2 \right) \equiv V\left(\boldsymbol{x}_1-\boldsymbol{x}_2\right) \delta\left(\tau_1-\tau_2\right),

\int_0^\beta \mathrm{d} \tau_2 U\left(\boldsymbol{x}_1-\boldsymbol{x}_2, \tau_1-\tau_2 \right)=\int_0^\beta \mathrm{d} \tau_2 V\left(\boldsymbol{x}_1-\boldsymbol{x}2\right) \delta\left(\tau_1-\tau_2\right)=V\left(\boldsymbol{x}1-\boldsymbol{x}2\right),

\hat{H}I’\left(\tau_1\right) =\frac{1}{2} \sum\limits{\alpha\beta}\int_0^\beta \mathrm{d} \tau_2\iint \mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x}1 \mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x}2 \hat{\psi}{I \alpha}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}1, \tau_1\right) \hat{\psi}{I \beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}2, \tau_2\right)
U\left(\boldsymbol{x}1-\boldsymbol{x}2, \tau_1-\tau_2 \right) \hat{\psi}^{}{I \beta}\left(\boldsymbol{x}2, \tau_2\right) \hat{\psi}^{}{I \alpha}\left(\boldsymbol{x}1, \tau_1\right) .

\int_0^\beta \hat{H}I’\left(\tau_1\right) \mathrm{d} \tau_1=\frac{1}{2} \sum\limits{\alpha\beta}\iint \mathrm{d} x_1 \mathrm{d} x_2 \hat{\psi}{I \alpha}^{\dagger}\left(x_1\right) \hat{\psi}{I \beta}^{\dagger}\left(x_2\right) U\left(x_1-x_2\right) \hat{\psi}^{}{I \beta}\left(x_2\right) \hat{\psi}^{}{I \alpha}\left(x_1\right).



\mathcal{G}{\alpha \beta}\left(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau ; \boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)=-\left\langle\hat{T}\tau\left[\hat{\psi}{I \alpha}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau) \hat{\psi}{I \beta}^{\dagger}\left(\boldsymbol{x}’, \tau’\right)\right]\right\rangle{0\mathrm{C}},
$$
这里C表示所有相连的图. 进一步, 可以按零温时的方法得到有限温度下的费曼图规则.

notes many-body physics
